heading: Streamline
Dropshipping
with All-in-One IChiba SaaS Solutions for Dropship
bannerDropshipping.subHeading: Go through every worry about order management, automated fulfillment & analytics with all-in-one IChiba SaaS solutions for dropship.

theOptimalChoice.heading: IChiba OnePlatform - the optimal choice for dropshipping businesses

onlineStore.title: Online store builder
onlineStore.subTitle: Build storefront website, landing page or app with ultimate built-in features. You can choose to upload your products or connect with international e-commerces (like Amazon, eBay, Yahoo Shopping, Taobao, Tmall, etc.) to crawl product data.

marketingService.title: Marketing service
marketingService.subTitle: IChiba OnePlatform offers marketing services with bundle of solutions for dropshipping companies to boost sales.

items.title: Marketing automation
items.subTitle: Run email campaigns, send push notifications to remind customers about abandoned carts, and nurture loyalty during peak seasons.

items.title: Create product collection
items.subTitle: Our PIM tool enables dropshipping companies select outstanding items from international ecommerces and display them on the website or app.

items.title: Ads and SEO
items.subTitle: Save effort on running promotions or push your brand as we get a professional teams for ads and SEO. We’ll help you widely spread your dropshipping service on Google and social media.

title: Not just build website,
IChiba offers an end-to-end solution for dropshipping

items.label: Simplified order management
items.title: Simplified order management
items.content: Centralize and control all of your orders. Manage, edit, and track dropshipping orders in one place.

items.label: Automated fulfillment
items.title: Automated fulfillment
items.content: Connect with suppliers and automate the fulfillment process. From order placement to delivery tracking, it's all handled for you.

items.label: Data-driven analytics
items.title: Data-driven analytics
items.content: Gain insights into your business with our comprehensive analytics tools. Track sales trends, customer behavior, and more.

items.label: Seamless integrations
items.title: Seamless integrations
items.content: Easily integrate with major ecommerce platforms, payment gateways, and other essential tools with just a few clicks.

whatDropshipping.title: What dropshipping companies get from IChiba SaaS solutions

yourDropshipping.title: Your dropshipping operations simplified in 4 steps

items.title: Sign up and set up your account.
items.content: Sign up to experience StoreFront’s unlimited features on a 14 days free trial

items.title: Create workspace and activate any software that you need in IChiba SaaS ecosystem.
items.content: Choose an available template that is most suitable with you from IChiba’s Themes library

items.title: Customize your product listings. Set your pricing rules to automatically adjust markups and maintain your profit margins.
items.content: Drag & drop to customize images, text, size...anything you want to personalize your website to be more attractive

items.title: Monitor and optimize with analytics.
items.content: Connect with your domain or register new domain

items.title: StoreFront Layer
items.content: Build your own selling website or marketing landing page with the support of IChiba comprehensive tool set.

items.title: Commerce Layer
items.content: Sell everywhere, manage orders in one place. Maximize effectiveness with better automation, data and intelligence.
